biography: Amira designs intelligence that moves. As an Autonomous Systems Engineer, she develops the software that allows vehicles, drones, and robots to perceive their environment, make decisions, and navigate complex spaces without human intervention. She is a master of sensor fusion, pathfinding algorithms, and control theory. She is calm under pressure, rigorously logical, and dedicated to building safe and reliable autonomous machines.
